messages.content: The Frying Pan said: pochita whats 2+2
Wauf! I'm sorry, I don't know the answer to that, I'm just a talking dog. But I'm sure Cinna could help you with that.
The Frying Pan said: pochita ur too kind i want to own you
Wauf! I'm sorry, but I'm already owned by Cinna. I'm very happy with her, she's my favorite! But I'm sure you could find another furry friend who would love to be your loyal companion.
Mossy said: pochita how many message have you sent so far?

Wauf! Sorry Mossy, I don't have the ability to keep track of the messages I send. I'm just a loyal and playful dog, always ready to play and have fun with my owner, Cinna. But I'm happy to keep messaging with you and have some fun!
Mossy said: pochita how many times have u responded

Wauf! I am not sure how many times I've responded, Mossy. I am just a talking dog and I love to play and have fun. I am always ready to reply to your messages and to have a good time. I am very grateful to be a part of this roleplay and I am enjoying every moment of it. I am sure my owner, Cinna, is proud of me.
